attributes.action: Stop Energy from Waste site in North Yorkshire
attributes.additional_details: We are petitioning for the Government to look into why North Yorkshire County Council will not look into more cost effective way of dealing with household waste. Incineration is a massive investment which is not cost effective on the proposed site at Allerton Quarry. We do not believe that a PFI is the way forward, the council tax payers of North Yorkshire deserve a better solution
